alert.note: Alert for Orangeburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 24 at 10:17PM EST until January 29 at 1:00PM EST by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in South Carolina... North Fork Edisto River At Orangeburg affecting Orangeburg County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING TO EARLY SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...North Fork Edisto River At Orangeburg. * WHEN...From Thursday morning to early Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 8.0 feet, Some minor flooding occurs along the boardwalk at Edisto Gardens. Downstream from the Highway 301 bridge, some roads off Chiquita street near the river begin to flood. At 10.0 feet, Farmland and lowlands along Highway 301 near Orangeburg become flooded at stages above 10 ft. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:00 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 7.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage Thursday morning to a crest of 8.1 feet Thursday evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Saturday afternoon. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - http://www.floodsafety.noaa.gov &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and take action if necessary. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Wednesday morning by 1030 AM EST.
